backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata describing two blog-related updates and their affected files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file with SEO, Open Graph, Twitter, and Pinterest meta tags and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component toggling between homepage and full blog post view while updating SEO metadata.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostVie: Renders the complete blog post with images, sections, tool list, dividers, SEO update, and a back button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/sections/BlogSec: Shows a preview card of the tutorial post with a button to open the full blog view.
frontend/src/components/sections/CourseR: Explains course benefits and includes buttons linking to a placeholder affiliate URL.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeHer: Hero header with background texture, intro text, and a CTA button using a placeholder affiliate link.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIsR: React component rendering a styled informational section on rug tufting with tool lists and feature cards.
frontend/src/content/blogPost.ts: Exports a detailed blog post object containing introductory text, tool descriptions, and step-by-step rug-making instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query methods are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm color palette with light/dark themes and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Utility function that updates the document title and meta tags for SEO, Open Graph, and Twitter metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, typography, utilities, and theme extensions for a warm aesthetic.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, and existing features for a beginner-friendly rug tufting tutorial site with affiliate links and Pinterest-optimized layout. Lists architectural notes, features, and metadata used for build planning.
